meta_text: ('‘ being a Book of Instructions on the ‘Thousand Angels of the Heaven of Bliss,’ a Lama Practice Connected to the Supplication known as ‘Love with Nothing It Sees,’ Directed to the Holy Tsongkapa, who Embodies all Three the Knowledge, Love, and Power of Each and Every Victorious Buddha_RGYAL BA BDUN PA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO (1708-1757)', 'rtf')
